effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target's [Special Defense]{mechanic:special-defense} by six [stages]{mechanic:stage}.
This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises [Special Defense]{mechanic:special-defense} by six [stages]{mechanic:stage} in battle.  Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text_entries.text:
戦闘中の　ポケモンの
特防を　ものすごく　あげる。
ひっこめると　元に　戻る。

It raises the Sp. Def stat of a Pokémon
in battle immensely. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

Aumenta incredibilmente la Difesa Speciale di un
Pokémon in una lotta. L’effetto svanisce se il
Pokémon è sostituito.

Comunicador de alta tecnología con cámara que
permite hablar a cuatro personas a la vez.

Hebt den Spezial-Verteidigungs-Wert eines
Pokémon im Kampf enorm an. Die Wirkung endet
mit dem Austausch des Pokémon.

Augmente fortement la Défense Spéciale pendant
un combat. L’effet s’estompe si le Pokémon
se retire.

배틀 중인 포켓몬의 특수방어를
엄청나게 올린다. 포켓몬을 볼에
넣어버리면 원래대로 되돌아간다.

せんとうちゅうの　ポケモンの
とくぼうを　ものすごく　あげる。
ひっこめると　もとに　もどる。

It raises the Sp. Def stat of a Pokémon
in battle immensely. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

It raises the Sp. Def stat of a Pokémon
in battle immensely. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

Monte fortement la Déf. Spé. pendant
un combat. L’effet s’estompe
si le Pokémon se retire.
